facts: The placement scenario in India is undergoing a rapid transformation, driven by technological advancements, entrepreneurial spirit, and evolving job markets.
There is a reduction in placements in higher educational institutions in India, with media reports suggesting a decrease of 30-70%.
Only 7% of Indian colleges achieve full campus placement.
The gig economy has demonstrated resilience even during the pandemic, with platform workers playing an indispensable role in urban India.
